mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission ( id, description, url, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{description}, #{url}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, description, url, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime FROM permission WHERE id = #{id} AND is_delete = 2
